title: State Sen. Nozzolio to host food conference
content: State Sen. Michael F. Nozzolio, R-54th District, will present “New York Loves Food” from 9:30 a.m. to 3 p.m. Oct. 14 in Jordan Hall, Cornell University New York State Agricultural Experiment Station, 630 W. North St. Representatives from the farm, food and beverage sectors will discuss agricultural and food research and development, economic policy, job creation and the future of food processing and safety. Registration required. For more infomration, visit bit.ly/1QCQc7o or call 315-568-9816 or 518-455-2366.
